Subjects: Trinity, prayers to; prayers, to Trinity
_description: Oracio devota in anglicis uerbis: to the Trinity — thirty cross-rhymed quatrains

BodLye30.First Lines:
Fader sone and holy goostLord to the i make my
                    mone…
BodLye30.Last Lines:
…On the to see that comely syghtffadir & sone & holy
                    goost

NijmegenUL194.First Lines:
Father and Son and Holy GostLord to the I make my
                    mone…
NijmegenUL194.Last Lines:
…In þe to haue that swete syghteFather and Son and Holy
                    Goste. Amen
NijmegenUL194.Editions:
Connolly,  Margaret. 
             “Some Unrecorded Middle English Verse in a Nijmegen Manuscript.” 
             Notes & Queries
         46 (1999): 442-4: 443-4.
